description: Query elevation data for multiple coordinate pairs (up to 100 coordinates)

serial.description: Get elevation data for multiple coordinates
serial.name: elevationData

serial.description: Display bulk elevation data in table format
serial.title: Bulk Elevation Data
serial.name: elevationTable

serial.description: Analyze bulk elevation data and provide insights
serial.query: Based on the elevation data provided for multiple locations (Denver: 39.7392,-104.9903, New York: 40.7128,-74.0060, Los Angeles: 34.0522,-118.2437), give me a comprehensive analysis. Include: 1) Elevation comparisons between the locations, 2) Geographic significance of the elevation differences, 3) How elevation might impact climate, weather, or living conditions in each area, 4) Any notable patterns or insights from the data.
